content: अभिप्लु {c4c} <ab>A.</ab> {@--1@} To go up to, jump or leap towards. {@--2@} To over flow; (<ab>fig.</ab>) affect, fill with, overwhelm; तमसाभिप्लुते लोके रजसा च <ls>Mb.</ls>; रजसाभिप्लुतां नारीं <ls>Ms. 4. 41</ls> being in her courses; <ls>Y. 2. 50.</ls> {@--3@} To spring to or over, spring upon. {%--<ab>Caus.</ab>%} To wash or ripple against.
